title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Telemark, Norway
content:
Photo submitted by Thomas Tveit Rosenlund, “Had a two day getaway going to Nisser (lake) in Telemark, Norway. A pleasant stay at the lakeside in my hammock and an excellent dinner at Fjonebrygg earlier in the evening. Great view of the lake from the campsite the next morning…”

We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.
author: Kristi Benedict
